## Source: amazon-inspector (e0772e230f188de88a82becfa6493f2c39c36e63290339595308366a84154a56)
The package optly was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e70192025ea0e8c030d0adbe15f6c3272271f3b25cb13eedfb8136da48c9a29a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'optly' @ 90.6.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
